divs: sighting detailsas we were walking we noticed an object in the sky moving rapidly but slightlyerratic .. we watched the object until it was no longer visible. there were norunning lights noticed, just a glow to the object. there was also no soundheard from the object. we continued our walk about 1\4 mile and we noticed anobject again behaving in the same manner. only this time there appeared to bebeams of light going towards the object and also from it. then after a fewbeams of light were shot towards\from it ... it turned red and vanished.
Summary: UFO in the sky being shot at
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Blackshear
There were no other sightings in Blackshear on or around July 29th 2002
